title: DNS Toys (2022)
dot: digraph dns_toys{rankdir=TB;subgraph cluster_main{label="dns.toys Services";"World time"->"dig mumbai.time @dns.toys";"World time"->"dig newyork.time @dns.toys";"World time"->"dig paris/fr.time @dns.toys";"Timezone conversion"->"dig 2023-05-28T14:00-mumbai-paris/fr.time @dns.toys";"Weather"->"dig mumbai.weather @dns.toys";"Weather"->"dig newyork.weather @dns.toys";"Weather"->"dig amsterdam/nl.weather @dns.toys";"Unit conversion"->"dig 42km-mi.unit @dns.toys";"Unit conversion"->"dig 32GB-MB.unit @dns.toys";"Currency conversion (forex)"->"dig 100USD-INR.fx @dns.toys";"Currency conversion (forex)"->"dig 50CAD-AUD.fx @dns.toys";"IP echo"->"dig -4 ip @dns.toys";"IP echo"->"dig -6 ip @dns.toys";"Number to words"->"dig 987654321.words @dns.toys";"Usable CIDR Range"->"dig 10.0.0.0/24.cidr @dns.toys";"Usable CIDR Range"->"dig 2001:db8::/108.cidr @dns.toys";"Number base conversion"->"dig 100dec-hex.base @dns.toys";"Number base conversion"->"dig 755oct-bin.base @dns.toys";"Pi"->"dig pi @dns.toys";"Pi"->"dig pi -t txt @dns.toys";"Pi"->"dig pi -t aaaa @dns.toys";"English dictionary"->"dig fun.dict @dns.toys";"English dictionary"->"dig big - time.dict @dns.toys";"Rolling dice"->"dig 1d6.dice @dns.toys";"Rolling dice"->"dig 3d20/2.dice @dns.toys";"Tossing coin"->"dig coin @dns.toys";"Tossing coin"->"dig 2.coin @dns.toys";"Random number generation"->"dig 1 - 100.rand @dns.toys";"Random number generation"->"dig 30 - 200.rand @dns.toys";"Epoch/Unix timestamp conversion"->"dig 784783800.epoch @dns.toys";"Calculate aerial distance"->"dig A12.9352,77.6245/12.9698,77.7500.aerial @dns.toys";"Generate UUIDs"->"dig 5.uuid @dns.toys";"Help"->"dig help @dns.toys";}subgraph cluster_shortcut{label="Shortcut functions";"Bash"->"alias dy=\"dig +short @dns.toys\"";"Fish"->"alias dy=\"dig +noall +answer +additional $argv @dns.toys\"";"Zsh"->"alias dy=\"dig +short @dns.toys\"";"Bash"->"dy berlin.time";"Bash"->"dy mumbai.weather";"Bash"->"dy 100USD - INR.fx";}"Why?"->"For fun. I spend a lot of time on the terminal and doing quick unit conversions, weather checks etc. without having to open a clunky search page is useful.";}
